text: (tavada) “niyata vaśayenma mā ovunva mārgaya værada yāmaṭa salasvannemi. ovunṭa (puhu) viśvāsayan æti kara, (yakṣayin venuven prārthanā karanu læbū eḷu, gava, oṭuvan ādī) satungē kaṇ kapā damana lesaṭada ovunva poḷam̆bavannemi. allāhgē utpādanayan gæna bhēda æti karavana lesaṭada niyata vaśayenma mā ovunva poḷam̆bavannemi” (yayida kīvēya). ebævin kavurun allāh misa, (mevæni) ṣeyitānavarunva (tamanṭa) ārakṣakayin bavaṭa pat kara gannēda, ohu niyata vaśayenma pæhædili pāḍuvama at kara gannēya
